verbose_text: On the other hand, at the end of continuous treatment with selumetinib, PD-1 expression was decreased in both CD4+ and CD8+ T cells, while CTLA-4 was only found to be downregulated in CD8+ T cells, as determined by both percentage and median fluorescence intensity (MFI) (XREF_FIG, XREF_FIG, and XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
